content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for coming to see the apartment. As the landlord, I want to make sure that we agree on a rental price that is fair and beneficial for both of us. What is your proposed rental price for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest price possible.

I am a student and I have a budget of 1500 Euros per month, so I need to make sure that the rental price is within my budget.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable rental price.

I am dependable and responsible, so I am sure that I will pay the rent on time and take care of the apartment.

I don't want to continue the negotiation if we can't agree on a rental price that is within my budget.

Thanks for your understanding.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Bo Li. As the landlord, I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price that fits within your budget. However, I would like to clarify that the 25 square meter apartment is in a prime location in New York and is highly sought after by potential tenants. Therefore, I am confident that I can command a rental price that is higher than your budget allows.

That being said, I am open to negotiating with you to find a rental price that works for both of us. I would like to hear your thoughts on what you are willing to pay for the apartment, and we can work from there.

I appreciate your willingness to be on good terms with me and your commitment to paying the rent on time and taking care of the apartment. Please let me know if you have any specific requirements or concerns that we can address during the negotiation process.

If we are unable to agree on a rental price that works for both of us, I may need to consider other potential tenants. However, I am confident that we can find a mutually agreeable rental price that meets your needs and allows me to maximize my gains as the landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your position as a landlord, but I am a student who has a tight budget. I am willing to negotiate, but I am not sure how much I can offer. I am open to your suggestions and would like to hear what you are willing to accept.

Thanks for your understanding.

I am also willing to sign a long-term lease if that would help you.

Thanks for your time.

I appreciate your willingness to work with me.

I am also willing to provide references if that would help you feel more comfortable with my ability to pay the rent and take care of the apartment.

Thanks again.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Bo Li. I understand your situation as a student with a tight budget, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a rental price that works for both of us.

As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. However, I am also open to exploring the possibility of a long-term lease, as this can provide stability for both of us.

I would be happy to discuss specific rental prices and payment options with you. I would also be willing to consider your references and review your financial situation to ensure that you are a responsible tenant who will pay the rent on time and take care of the apartment.

If we are able to agree on a rental price and lease terms that work for both of us, I am confident that we can establish a positive and mutually beneficial relationship.

Please let me know if you have any specific questions or concerns that we can address during the negotiation process. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
